text: Va musaxxaru toʙe kard şaʙro ʙaroi rohati şumo va rūzro ʙaroi darjofti zindagiaton va xurşedro ʙarojaton ravşan soxt va mohro ʙarojaton partavi nur gardond va sitoragon hama dar osmon farmonʙardori amri Ū hastand. Alʙatta, dar in kori ofaridan va mute' soxtan, ki xiradmandon meandeşand, iʙoathost
